name: Forest Tower
description:
This game was made for the VR Jan Jam 2022!

This game uses continuous movement. So we recommend having some previous experience with VR. 

Forest Tower takes you into a tower with a little puzzle.

This game is for PC only.

This game uses the the following assets from unity asset store:

Sun Temple - from Sandro T

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sun-temple-115417

Medieval Gold - from Mister Necturus

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/medieval-gold-14162

Animated Old Chest - from NOT_Lonely

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/animated-old-chest-20179

Dream Forest - from IL.ranch

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/dream-forest-tree-1052...

Rust Key - from Aleksn09

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/rust-key-167590
